task.summary: Switched to PRAW4, needed client_id and secret which are stored in separate ini and read in by module configparser
Switched to PRAW4, needed client_id and secret which are stored in separate ini and read in by module configparser
Fixed search and use of short_link -> shortlink in PRAW4
Converter for dltxt to csv
Converter for dltxt to csv, working
Read in df, check for downloaded files working but not replaced in old code
Default task
Created AudioDownload class for easier access to check for DLs and write info

Modified rip_file and rip_from_.. to work with new dlcheck and class AudioDownload
not working
Single rip working, user rip working mostly, still not updating pandas/csv
Single rip working, user rip working mostly, still not updating pandas/csv
Checking sgasm_url instead of direct url now, when file exists check direct urls first and if match is found skip it and write missing data (URLsg, redditURL, etc.) to df
Started implementing automatically filling in missing reddit info
Filling in missing reddit info and setting it with tuples to avoid a lot of code is working
Able to pass along kwargs when searching reddit
Appending info of new downloads to df working, always export to csv and json, converter updated to include new cols and also save to csv and json
Appending info of new downloads to df working, always export to csv and json, converter updated to include new cols and also save to csv and json

Now you can download urls found by clipwatcher directly instead of having to type in the name of txt, but it still gets saved in a txtfile
Best method for getting audios, no unwanted links, but some may be missed compared to user rip oder dl from top
Fixed not appending empty elements when reddit_info on AudioDownload isnt set
Everything working
File is now actually skipped when it exists and is found in direct URLs
Always save df to csv/json even we didnt have any new dls since were temporarirly filling in missing reddit info that might get lost otherwise
Also save df to csv/json when ripping from reddit, even we didnt have any new dls since were temporarirly filling in missing reddit info that might get lost otherwise
Hardcoded checking for [f4f] in tags but only skip it when 4m] isnt present; Added option to rip from redditor
Added dummy line when converting dltxts to df so dtype doesnt change when loading from csv; Added way to deal with BOM at start of dltxt when matching date pattern

Added dummy line when converting dltxts to df so dtype doesnt change when loading from csv; Added way to deal with BOM at start of dltxt when matching date pattern; Now filters for unique URLs when taking single reddit links

Implementing chirb.it as host, refactoring sgasm specific stuff
Implemented chirb.it as host, refactored sgasm specific stuff; rip_file is now a method of AudioDownload; not writing to dltxtfile anymore
